articles.author: Kyle Newbould
articles.title: Neymar signing would revive Cristiano Ronaldo problem at Man Utd - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Reports have suggested the Brazilian wants out of Paris Saint-Germain and has been offered to Man United ahead of the summer transfer window
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag has overseen major change in his debut season at Manchester United and a sensible approach to transfer business has been one of his biggest strengths.
United spent over £200million last… [+3377 chars]
